    • showSearch

      @GetMapping("/search") public String showSearch(@RequestParam(name="show",required=false,defaultValue="false") String name, @RequestParam(name="token",required=false,defaultValue="none") String token, @RequestParam(name="page",required=false,defaultValue="1") String pagina, @RequestParam(name="connected",required=false,defaultValue="-1") String ligados, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Function used to ask the user for tokens to display some results
      Parameters:
      name - -> if it is to show any result or if we are waiting for an user input
      token - -> token that the user send
      pagina - -> current page of results
      ligados - -> where we want to show the linked urls to an url
      model - -> used to send to the view information that it needs
      Returns:
      the search page

    • checkUrl

      @GetMapping("/linked") public String checkUrl(@RequestParam(name="show",required=false,defaultValue="false") String name, @RequestParam(name="url",required=false,defaultValue="null") String url, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      This function is used to ask an user for an url that he wants to see the urls linked to that one
      Parameters:
      name - -> variable used to see if it is to show the result or if we are waiting for an user input
      url - -> url that the user wants to see the linked pages
      model - -> used to send to the view information that it needs
      Returns:
      the linked page

      Returns:
      the page with the results
